product_name: Camaro Aquaskin Swim Top - Women's - 2013 Closout
long_description: The Camaro Aquaskin Bikini Top delivers good coverage, light insulation and an athletic fit for swimming, paddling, triathlons and playing in the surf in comfort. Quick-drying nylon/spandex fabric blend offers light insulation for continued warmth out of the water. UPF 50 sun protection. Closeout.
short_description: The Camaro Aquaskin Bikini Top delivers good coverage, light insulation and an athletic fit for swimming, paddling, triathlons and playing in the surf in comfort.
